original_text: Egypt is rising like the waters of the Nile. Its streams of water quickly pour out over the earth. Egypt says, “I will rise up and I will cover the earth. I will destroy cities. I will kill the people who live in them.” Egypt is rising like the waters of the Nile.
korean_text: 애굽은 나일 강이 불어남 같고 강물이 출렁임 같도다 그가 이르되 내가 일어나 땅을 덮어 성읍들과 그 주민을 멸할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Egypt is rising like the waters of the Nile.
Its streams of water quickly pour out over the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 물줄기가 땅 위로 빠르게 쏟아져 나온다.

sentences.original_text: and I will cover the earth.
I will kill the people who live in them."
Egypt is rising like the waters of the Nile.
